original_title: A Casa de Dentro Carlos Nogueira
overview: Can an artist be the protagonist of his life and interpret a film about himself? Is the artwork a redemption for our troubled times? with this question We set out in search of a project for a house and its thousand faces that accompany Carlos Nogueira. A demiurge with a diverse and vast work like the landscapes of Mozambique where he grew up. Multidisciplinary artist, where all his gestures enunciate a sublime trait, whose craft and purpose in his life reveals itself as a work of art.
title: A Casa de Dentro Carlos Nogueira
